channel.title: 2008 elections
channel.description:
So for the Americans of this forum, who do you think will/should win the upcoming elections?
My hope would be for Rudy Giuliani to win, basically because when 9/11 happened he was able to keep nyc in tact, and with his proposed tax cuts and all I feel he would benefit the country.
I'm not trying to be sexist, but I don't believe the US is ready for a woman president.
You?

item.title: 2008 elections
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

I dont think he’s realized how many people have told him to gtfo.

Uhh. If either one of those succeed in gaining the title of presidency, we are fucked as a nation.

Hillary: Self explanatory.

Obama: He will undoubtedly be the number one target for southerners with guns. He is cool, but I dont think he would be safe as a president.

Read full topic

item.title: 2008 elections
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“da wolf 92, post:22, topic:173356”][quote author=BlackThursday link=topic=233644.msg1997242#msg1997242 date=1200375014]
Ron Paul, thank you very much.
[/quote]

who is ron paul? obama is going to win we all know[/quote]

Well maybe you should get informed. If your preaching for obama and have no knowledge of the other candidates how can you truely say you’ve done research and made a smart decision?

DR. Paul’s website is here:
http://www.ronpaul2008.com/

Go take a look.

item.title: 2008 elections
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

California is almost a strictly democratic state. Most views are democratic, as well as me(usually).
I believe in most democratic things, but this election needs to go to the republicans. It sure as hell is going to be either Obama or Clinton. I’m just praying to god it isn’t clinton. She does not deserve it just because shes a woman. She should win based on politics, which won’t happen because if you listened to half the shit she says, shes full of shit and a complete bitch.

And also we need a president who wont get extra emotional a few days out of the month. There is a reason men are genetically natural born leaders[compared to women].

Read full topic

item.title: 2008 elections
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“Swordskid61, post:12, topic:173356”]“Hussein” Obama, Fuck No

Then he’s angry that he’s half white.

Hilary won’t run the country her husband will. She know barely anything about politics, let alone how to run a country.

That one guy, uhhh… the one that was a POW, my vote would go for him. He knows alot about politics, and he knows about war and the pain and suffering. He’s a good choice.[/quote]
McCain?

hes an idiot. He needs to be shot in the face for his stand on the war. Hes a complete idiot, he wants to stay there for indefinitely and was quoted saying he would stay 100 years if thats what it would take.

Obama. I would love to see how the south reacts.
Loyalists who are racist would be in quite the pickle.
How can you love your country if you don’t believe in your leader, he’s black, so you can’t love it.
Either he’d be killed, the world would be a little less racist or there’ll be a mass suiciding

I hope you understand, I’m just rushing this.

-Mh
